title: Felixou的缩略图们
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:hansarp]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]

[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Bahiana&display=swap');

:root{
--white: 244, 244, 244;
--dark: 46, 14, 2;
--medium-accent: 212, 104, 0;
--bright-accent: 242, 133, 0;
--toggle-roundness: 0;
--swatch-text-light: var(--white);
--swatch-menutxt-light-color: var(--white);
--link-color: 242, 133, 0;
--visited-link-color: 189, 107, 0;
--borderColor: #ff8c00 !important;
}
#header {
     --header-h1-font-size: calc(var(--base-font-size)*3.25);
     --header-title: "FELIXOU ARTPAGE";
     --header-title-mobile: "ARTPAGE";
     --swatch-headerh1-color: var(--bright-accent);

.tooltip {
  position: relative;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: transform .16s;
}
#page-content .tooltip > a[href*="dark-achievement-badges"] {
  box-shadow: none!important;
}
.tooltip .tooltiptext {
  width: 120px;
  background-color: #21252E;
  color: #f8f8f8;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 5px;
  border-radius: 6px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 95px;
  left: calc(50% - 5px);
  margin-left: -60px;
  z-index: 2;
  visibility: hidden;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: opacity 0.3s;
}
.tooltip .tooltiptext::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 100%;
    left: 50%;
    margin-left: -5px;
    border-width: 5px;
    border-style: solid;
    border-color: transparent transparent #21252E transparent;
}
.tooltip:hover {
    transform: scale(1.6);
    z-index: 2;
}
.tooltip:hover > a {
   background: transparent;
}
.tooltip:hover .tooltiptext {
  visibility: visible;
  opacity: 1;
}
[[/module]]

= 所以。

= 我在我的[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/felixoupage 作者页]里为我的文章们做了缩略图，这看起来很酷。很明显，有些人挺喜欢这样的。后来我让一些作者把他们的文章发给我，这样我就可以做更多更多的缩略图，而且还能搞个艺作页。就在这里了。

= 这些图做起来很有趣，希望你也能喜欢上。

[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="tooltip"]][[image http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/testing-box-of-felixou/author.jpg width="300px"style="background-color: var(--bgBadgeColor, #21252E); padding: .66rem .7rem .4rem .5rem; border-radius: .6rem 2.5rem .6rem .6rem; margin: .3rem; border: solid 4px var(--borderColor, #CEA0FF);" link="https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-3086"]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]]SCP-3086 - 作者之死及其他[[/span]][[/span]]

[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="tooltip"]][[image http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/testing-box-of-felixou/chairsthumbnail.png width="300px"style="background-color: var(--bgBadgeColor, #21252E); padding: .66rem .7rem .4rem .5rem; border-radius: .6rem 2.5rem .6rem .6rem; margin: .3rem; border: solid 4px var(--borderColor, #CEA0FF);" link="https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-3311"]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]]SCP-3311 - 全是椅子[[/span]][[/span]]

[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="tooltip"]][[image http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/testing-box-of-felixou/hammer.jpg width="300px"style="background-color: var(--bgBadgeColor, #21252E); padding: .66rem .7rem .4rem .5rem; border-radius: .6rem 2.5rem .6rem .6rem; margin: .3rem; border: solid 4px var(--borderColor, #CEA0FF);" link="https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-4927"]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]]SCP-4927 - 锤砧与鱼[[/span]][[/span]]

[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="tooltip"]][[image http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/testing-box-of-felixou/gold.jpg width="300px"style="background-color: var(--bgBadgeColor, #21252E); padding: .66rem .7rem .4rem .5rem; border-radius: .6rem 2.5rem .6rem .6rem; margin: .3rem; border: solid 4px var(--borderColor, #CEA0FF);" link="https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-5083"]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]]SCP-5083 - 摘金争夺战！[[/span]][[/span]]

[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="tooltip"]][[image http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/testing-box-of-felixou/crystal.jpg width="300px"style="background-color: var(--bgBadgeColor, #21252E); padding: .66rem .7rem .4rem .5rem; border-radius: .6rem 2.5rem .6rem .6rem; margin: .3rem; border: solid 4px var(--borderColor, #CEA0FF);" link="https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-5164"]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]]SCP-5164 - 爱之晶（用基金会的力量守护你的爱情生活）[[/span]][[/span]]

[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="tooltip"]][[image http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/testing-box-of-felixou/planet.jpg width="300px"style="background-color: var(--bgBadgeColor, #21252E); padding: .66rem .7rem .4rem .5rem; border-radius: .6rem 2.5rem .6rem .6rem; margin: .3rem; border: solid 4px var(--borderColor, #CEA0FF);" link="https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-5651"]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]]SCP-5651 - 苦恶核心[[/span]][[/span]]

[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="tooltip"]][[image http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/testing-box-of-felixou/trans.jpg width="300px"style="background-color: var(--bgBadgeColor, #21252E); padding: .66rem .7rem .4rem .5rem; border-radius: .6rem 2.5rem .6rem .6rem; margin: .3rem; border: solid 4px var(--borderColor, #CEA0FF);" link="https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-6113"]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]]SCP-6113 - 临时反射[[/span]][[/span]]

[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="tooltip"]][[image http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/testing-box-of-felixou/lol.jpg width="300px"style="background-color: var(--bgBadgeColor, #21252E); padding: .66rem .7rem .4rem .5rem; border-radius: .6rem 2.5rem .6rem .6rem; margin: .3rem; border: solid 4px var(--borderColor, #CEA0FF);" link="https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/7000contestsherfcalibold"]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]]SCP-7000 - 我自首，我玩英雄联盟[[/span]][[/span]]

[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="tooltip"]][[image http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/testing-box-of-felixou/meet%20me%20in%20the%20stars.jpg width="300px"style="background-color: var(--bgBadgeColor, #21252E); padding: .66rem .7rem .4rem .5rem; border-radius: .6rem 2.5rem .6rem .6rem; margin: .3rem; border: solid 4px var(--borderColor, #CEA0FF);" link="https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/7000contestfabledtiefling"]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]]“SCP-7000 - 觅我于万千繁星间[[/span]][[/span]]

[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="tooltip"]][[image http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/testing-box-of-felixou/O5.jpg width="300px"style="background-color: var(--bgBadgeColor, #21252E); padding: .66rem .7rem .4rem .5rem; border-radius: .6rem 2.5rem .6rem .6rem; margin: .3rem; border: solid 4px var(--borderColor, #CEA0FF);" link="https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/7000contestfishwaltz"]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]]SCP-7000 - 确系十三[[/span]][[/span]]

[[span class="ruby"]][[span class="tooltip"]][[image http://scpdsandbox.wdfiles.com/local--files/testing-box-of-felixou/mangaka.jpg width="300px"style="background-color: var(--bgBadgeColor, #21252E); padding: .66rem .7rem .4rem .5rem; border-radius: .6rem 2.5rem .6rem .6rem; margin: .3rem; border: solid 4px var(--borderColor, #CEA0FF);" link="https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/7000contestveralta"]][[/span]][[span class="rt"]]SCP-7000 - 高堡漫画家：日出之国的忧郁[[/span]][[/span]]
